name: RENF
purpose: This function can be used to rename a file. It will return a value indicating whether or not the renaming was successful.

parts.description: The current file name, must include full path and extension.
The new file name, must include full path and extension.

return_type: L If the rename operation is successful the function will return .T., if not, .F..
comments: COMMENTS You may ‘move’ the file from one path to another by using the appropriate path values.
